mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, type, retime, lasttime
mapper.insert:

user_id,
username,
password,
type,
retime,
lasttime,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retime = #{retime,jdbcType=DATE},
lasttime = #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, retime = #{retime,jdbcType=DATE}, lasttime = #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
